techstack.title: Astar Tech Stack
techstack.description: As Astar 2.0 evolves, so does our tech. We are excited to offer our bleeding-edge, cross-layer tech stack that will allow developers to benefit from multiple VMs, layers and consensus protocols.

substrate.description: Astar Substrate is the backend technology powering Polkadot’s leading parachain. Unlock access to build across virtual machines seamlessly and tap into interoperability with all substrate-based protocols. Ink! And rust smart contracts ensure safety and our innovative reward mechanism powers unstoppable public goods.

features.multi_vm_support: Multi VM Support: EVM and WASM
features.interoperability_and_composability: Interoperability and Composability with Substrate chains
features.dapp_staking_rewards: dApp staking rewards providing builder income

zkevm.description: Astar zkEVM is the perfect solution for enterprises looking to leverage the security  and network effects of Ethereum without sacrificing the user experience. Powered by cutting-edge zero knowledge technology, Astar zkEVM empowers businesses to embrace web3 at scale while offering developers a familiar environment with proven tooling.

features.low_fees: Low fees even during high demand
features.access: Access to a vibrant web3 ecosystem
features.developer_experience: Familiar developer experience powered by Ethereum’s proven stack of tooling and infrastructure
